# Humans
Depending on who you ask, humans are either unremarkable or the universal standard to which everything else is compared, although one thing is certain, they have evolved towards enduring hardships for as long as possible.
They sprint [color=#ffa500]about 12% longer[/color] compared to other species.
Alongside Taking [color=#ffa500]around 20% longer[/color] to become [color=#fa0000]unconscious[/color].
